mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BB.DAY, 'YYYYMMDD') + NUM-1, 'YYYY') AS year ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BB.DAY, 'YYYYMMDD') + NUM-1, 'MM') AS month ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BB.DAY, 'YYYYMMDD') + NUM-1, 'DD') AS day ,decode(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BB.DAY, 'YYYYMMDD') + NUM-1, 'd'), '1','일', '2','월', '3','화', '4','수', '5','목', '6','금','토') as weekday FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM FROM dictionary A,( SELECT B.DAY AS BDAY, C.DAY AS CDAY FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') AS DAY FROM DUAL ) B, ( SELECT TO_CHAR(sysdate+14, 'YYYYMMDD') AS DAY FROM DUAL ) C ) B WHERE ROWNUM <= TO_DATE(B.CDAY, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(B.BDAY, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1) AA, ( SELECT TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') AS DAY FROM DUAL ) BB
